name: p2pistanbul
description: Example implementation for netzhuffle/P2PboardgameAPI with the boardgame Istanbul from Pegasus Spiele

scripts.prepublish: npm explore p2pboardgameapi -- npm install && cp node_modules/p2pboardgameapi/build/* src/ && cp node_modules/p2pboardgameapi/src/signaling.php src/ && cp node_modules/p2pboardgameapi/src/messages.db src/

author: Jannis Grimm <j@jannis.rocks> (http://jannis.rocks/)
